item.title: ä¸ºåšå®¢é…ç½®è¯„è®ºåŒº
item.content:encoded:
ä¸ºåšå®¢é…ç½®è¯„è®ºåŒº

  1. åœ¨ misc ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ–°å»º Giscus.astro æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå†…å®¹å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼ˆç”¨ä½ è‡ªå·±çš„å‚æ•°æ›¿æ¢ï¼‰ï¼š
<div id="giscus-comments"></div>

<script src="https://giscus.app/client.js"

Â  data-repo="17356085/17356085.github.io"

Â  data-repo-id="R_kgDOPcYMPg"

Â  data-category="Announcements"

Â  data-category-id="DIC_kwDOPcYMPs4CuH1t"

Â  data-mapping="pathname"

Â  data-strict="0"

Â  data-reactions-enabled="1"

Â  data-emit-metadata="0"

Â  data-input-position="bottom"

Â  data-theme="{theme}"

Â  data-lang="zh-CN"

Â  crossorigin="anonymous"

Â  async>

</script>

<script is:inline>
  // ä½ ç«™ç‚¹çš„æš—è‰²ä¸»é¢˜ classï¼Œé€šå¸¸æ˜¯ 'dark'
  const DARK_CLASS = 'dark';
  // giscus æ”¯æŒçš„ä¸»é¢˜å
  const LIGHT_THEME = 'light';
  const DARK_THEME = 'dark';

  function setGiscusTheme(theme) {
    const iframe = document.querySelector('iframe.giscus-frame');
    if (!iframe) return;
    iframe.contentWindow.postMessage(
      {
        giscus: {
          setConfig: {
            theme: theme,
          },
        },
      },
      'https://giscus.app'
    );
  }

  // æ£€æŸ¥å½“å‰ä¸»é¢˜
  function getCurrentTheme() {
    return document.documentElement.classList.contains(DARK_CLASS) ? DARK_THEME : LIGHT_THEME;
  }

  // åˆå§‹è®¾ç½®
  window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    setTimeout(() => setGiscusTheme(getCurrentTheme()), 500);
  });

  // ç›‘å¬ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢ï¼ˆå‡è®¾ä½ çš„ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢ä¼šä¿®æ”¹ <html> çš„ classï¼‰
  const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
    setGiscusTheme(getCurrentTheme());
  });
  observer.observe(document.documentElement, { attributes: true, attributeFilter: ['class'] });
</script>
  1. åœ¨ [...slug].astro ä¸­è¿™æ ·å¯¼å…¥å’Œä½¿ç”¨ï¼š
